name: Paula Miller
text:
Great place but miss Christian (server) Noel is pretty AWESOME.
Why does the GM think it's fair to have her son take up an entire LARGE corner booth?  Maybe the owner shoould check this out. Maybe she should find a babysitter....REDICULOUS

name: Adam Green
text: Delicious pizza as always. I hope they bring the buffet back to this location in the future. The staff is always friendly and attentive. Thank you for the great food and service!!

name: Lauren B
text: This location has always been an old-school favorite -- even though the neighborhood needs some updates, it is always like an old friend.  The pizza buffet is still one of the best deals around.  Even when it is very busy, they always deliver great food!

name: Marilyn
text: Family-oriented, cozy restaurant with great service and delicious pizza üçï. I've always enjoyed coming here. New-style jukebox plays cool tunes, too. I do miss the old school Pac-Man game though.

name: Michael Veltri
text: Disapointed this pizza hut has no lunch Buffet

name: Ryan Wightman
text: Pizza hut has always been one of my favorite pizzas, but the past few years I feel like they haven't been as good. I was pleasantly surprised at how good the pizza was at this location...the building was old school, but who cares as long as the food is good!!

name: Kolayah Martincic
text: This Pizza Hut location is really run down and due for a remodel. I really wish the location offered a buffet and delivery. I had an ok experience with staff,  the cooks did a great job. We preordered our pizzas 6 hours in advance and left ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Peoples
text: I only gave 1 star because it wouldn't allow me to rate negative!   Service was terrible!   The staff was more interested in their friend that was standing at the counter talking to them than they were in the guests.   The breadsticks were ‚Ä¶More

name: Christine Czinke
text: The employees are very friendly and courteous! I wish I knew the girls name but..we came in w a large party and they were terrific!!

name: Jennifer Cartwright
text: Worst pizza ever!!! No flavor, crust was sweet and tasted like cardboard. Sauce wasn't good either. Never again.

text: I wish I could give this place 10 negative stars! I went to pick my pizza up and the manager is horrible! She yelled at the employee to come to the counter, which she already was. I needed to add on to the order and the employee, who was ‚Ä¶More

text:
Service and food was amazing. Best place to go for pizza,  fun and awesome service.  We travel 45 minutes to come to this particular pizza hut.
